currentIssues.description: Chord symbols have poor contrast (orange on dark gray background)
currentIssues.location: Fmaj7, Em7, A7, Dm, C, A#, F chord indicators

currentIssues.description: Chord symbols compete visually with lyrics, creating confusion about primary content
Inconsistent text sizing between chord symbols and lyrics disrupts readability
currentIssues.location: Chord symbols appear too large relative to lyrics

currentIssues.description: Insufficient vertical spacing between lyric lines for teleprompter viewing distance
currentIssues.location: Between 'All my troubles...' and 'Now it looks...' lines

currentIssues.description: Header buttons lack consistent styling and hover states
currentIssues.location: Settings gear, Upload Song, and Demo buttons

recommendations.title: Increase line spacing for teleprompter mode
recommendations.description: Add more vertical space between lyric lines for better readability at 3-10ft viewing distance.

recommendations.title: Improve chord symbol contrast
recommendations.description: Change chord colors to meet WCAG AAA standards for teleprompter viewing. Use white or very light yellow instead of orange.

recommendations.title: Standardize header button styling
recommendations.description: Apply consistent button styles with proper hover and focus states to header controls.
recommendations.code: className='px-4 py-2 rounded-md bg-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-600 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-white transition-colors'

recommendations.title: Create chord symbol style system
recommendations.description: Reduce chord symbol size and use consistent styling to support lyrics as primary content.

recommendations.title: Reposition chord symbols above lyrics
recommendations.description: Move chord symbols to a dedicated line above each lyric line, creating clear separation and hierarchy.
recommendations.code: flex flex-col gap-1 with chord row: className='text-sm text-gray-400' and lyric row: className='text-3xl text-gray-300'
